critique: The document is an executive order that withdraws land from sale and settlement and sets it apart for the use and occupancy of the Turtle Mountain band of Chippewas and such other Indians of the Chippewa tribe as the Secretary of the Interior may see fit to settle thereon. As the President, I would hope this elicits joy from the Chippewas and perhaps surprise from others. There is not enough information to suggest sadness, anger, fear, or disgust.
